TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit NativeObjectSecurity extends System.Security.AccessControl.CommonObjectSecurity
Public MustInherit Class NativeObjectSecurity Inherits CommonObjectSecurity

summary.span: Provides the ability to control access to native objects without direct manipulation of Access Control Lists (ACLs).

span.span: Provides the ability to control access to native objects without direct manipulation of Access Control Lists (ACLs).

summary.span: Native object types are defined by the enumeration.

span.span: Native object types are defined by the enumeration.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the sections of the security descriptor (access rules, audit rules, owner, primary group) of the securable object to include in this object.

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the sections of the security descriptor (access rules, audit rules, owner, primary group) of the securable object to include in this object.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified values.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified values.

summary.span: We recommend that the values of the parameters passed to the constructor and persist methods be identical.

span.span: We recommend that the values of the parameters passed to the constructor and persist methods be identical.

remarks.format: ## Remarks При сохранении объекта, если значение `includeSections` передан параметр метод не идентичен значение `includeSections` параметр, переданный в конструктор, используемый для создания, объекта, а разделы из сохраненного объекта может содержать значения непредсказуемыми.When persisting a object, if the value of the `includeSections` parameter passed to the method is not identical to the value of the `includeSections` parameter passed to the constructor used to create that object, sections of the persisted object can contain unpredictable values. Например, если конструктор вызывается с `includeSections` значение и более поздних версиях будет вызван для этого объекта с `includeSections` значение , итоговый сохраняются объект будет содержать непредсказуемым значения его правила аудита, группы и владельца.For example, if a constructor is called with an `includeSections` value of , and later a method is called on that object with an `includeSections` value of , the resulting persisted object will contain unpredictable values for its audit rules, group, and owner.
